title: Help riot
body:
I came in contact with a TF in my game calling himself a 'smurf' anyways he basically was calling people shit and then he AFKED anyways he then added me on his main (Master 1) and then proceeded to say

[10:55] Swemka: ?
[10:56] ESC Static: dont be a little **** sucking ***** diamond 5
[10:56] Swemka: LOL ITS THE TF
we won
[10:56] ESC Static: it frustrates good players
[10:56] Swemka: without you
lol
idiot
[10:56] ESC Static: why do I care?
its a smurf
[10:56] Swemka: dont care if you care
[10:56] ESC Static: ill afk every game I get you and I can do it across several accounts
[10:56] Swemka: and
:)
do it
JUST DO IT
[10:57] ESC Static: :) is what I'll be thinking after I cost you 30+ games of elo 
[10:57] Swemka: :)
[10:57] ESC Static: enjoy getting lol note'd ***** 


Please ban this guy! he will destroy alot of games otherwise!
